channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why cheaper power looks unlikely as Trump’s big budget law reshuffles the U.S. energy landscape
item.description: President Donald Trump’s One Big Beautiful Bill Act, signed into law earlier this month, will likely change the nation’s energy landscape — potentiall...

item.title: U.S. stock futures inch higher as investors look ahead to earnings, tariff developments
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed Sunday, as investors await the next tariff developments and a big week of quarterly earnings.

item.title: Weaving reality or warping it? The personalization trap in AI systems
item.description: Each of our versions of reality is changing with AI. This could erode our ability to agree on basic facts or navigate shared challenges.

item.title: Rethinking global connectivity: Why stratospheric UAVs could outperform satellites
item.description: Swift Engineering's president explores how solar-powered UAVs offer low-latency communications that could overcome satellite congestion. The post Reth...

item.title: 3 reasons why investors have largely ignored Trump’s tariff threats as Aug. 1 deadline approaches

item.title: They shrunk the airport lounge: Why that flight-day haven may be getting smaller
item.description: American Express and American Airlines airport lounges will soon be available in travel-sized versions.

item.title: My brother-in-law left $600K to a friend. He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD. Can my husband contest the will?
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: Maxvision buys core robot assets of Aldebaran, including Nao and Pepper
item.description: Maxvision said Aldebaran's IP and humanoid robots will enable it to make significant strides in its strategic roadmap. The post Maxvision buys core ro...

item.title: New embedding model leaderboard shakeup: Google takes #1 while Alibaba’s open source alternative closes gap
item.description: Google's new Gemini Embedding model now leads the MTEB benchmark. But it is facing fierce competition from closed and open source rivals.

item.title: America can’t out-innovate China without mechanical engineers — or robots

item.title: 5 key questions your developers should be asking about MCP
item.description: It’s MCP projects in production, not specification elegance or market buzz, that will determine if MCP (or something else) stays on top.

item.title: Meet AnyCoder, a new Kimi K2-powered tool for fast prototyping and deploying web apps
item.description: For novice developers or even those with expertise who want to spin up a new project fast, AnyCoder seems like a great place to start.

item.title: Lucid, Nuro, Uber team up on global robotaxi fleet
